executive_summary.headline: Day 9: UMA Registration & 1000x Learning Acceleration Infrastructure
key_accomplishments: Registered UMA (Universal Meta-Analyst) as Tier-2 Meta-Executive with EC-014_2026_PRODUCTION
Deployed Fast-Track G1 infrastructure with DEFCON binding (ADR-016)
Created CFAO × CRIO synthetic stress-testing integration tables
Established VEGA constitutional feedback loop with scope limitations

section_1_uma_registration.core_mandate: Compress time from Hypothesis → Validated Signal → Executable ROI
section_1_uma_registration.lvi_formula: Validated Executable Signals / Time from Hypothesis → Validation
constraints: Cannot modify models, schemas, or parameters

defcon_binding.description: Fast-Track auto-G1 ONLY valid when DEFCON = GREEN or YELLOW
defcon_binding.orange_behavior: All new Fast-Track approvals and pending auto-cycles suspended

section_3_directive_b_cfao_crio.architecture: CFAO Shadow Mode → Synthetic Scenarios → CRIO Falsification → UMA Analysis

key_constraints.synthetic_never_canonical: is_canonical = FALSE enforced via CHECK constraint
key_constraints.lvi_not_stored: learning_signal_weight only - LVI computed at aggregation layer

integration_flow: CFAO generates synthetic scenarios (24/7 shadow mode)
CRIO falsification runs against synthetic data
UMA compares synthetic-trained readiness vs real regime shifts
UMA calculates preparedness gap → feeds into LVI

section_4_directive_c_vega_feedback.purpose: Close the loop: Learning outcomes → Governance adjustments → Better learning

scope_limitation.description: VEGA feedback CANNOT amend ADR text
allowed: Procedural interpretations already permitted by ADR-004
scope_limitation.not_allowed: ADR text amendments - require full G4 CEO approval

stress_regime.reason: Definition mismatch between forecast and outcome (see Day 8 P0/P1 repair)

section_7_negative_controls.description: What We Deliberately Did NOT Do (Audit Defensibility)
items: Did NOT give UMA execution authority (advisory only per EC-014 Section 6)
Did NOT allow Fast-Track to bypass VEGA audit
Did NOT enable Fast-Track outside DEFCON GREEN/YELLOW
Did NOT store LVI as partial contributions (computed only at aggregation)
Did NOT allow VEGA feedback to amend ADR text
Did NOT treat synthetic scenarios as canonical truth

day_9_migrations.name: 253_cfao_crio_synthetic_integration.sql
day_9_migrations.purpose: Directive B - CFAO × CRIO synthetic stress-testing

day_9_migrations.name: 254_vega_feedback_loop.sql
day_9_migrations.purpose: Directive C - VEGA constitutional feedback loop

attestation_summary: UMA registration complete and verified in all three tables
Fast-Track G1 infrastructure deployed with DEFCON gate verified operational
CFAO × CRIO synthetic integration tables created with canonical safety constraints
VEGA feedback loop deployed with scope limitation triggers active

next_steps: UMA first daily learning audit upon reaching operational cadence
Day 10: Rung D eligibility decision (pending 2 successful cycles)
